main.name: Edwin Torres
main.description: Specializing in building exceptional websites, applications, and everything in between
main.bio: Recently I earned my Full-Stack Web Development certificate from Kenzie Academy in Indianapolis IN, and I would love to apply the skills I refined at Kenzie and my passion for technology to your Software Engineering role. In addition to my studies, I have spent the better part of my life being fascinated with and staying informed with the latest advancements in tech. Whether it be in hardware or software. Seeing the great advancements year-over-year in all aspects of tech excites me. And motivates me to not just be a part of that advancement, but be a spearhead of it.
main.contactmessage: I am currently looking for new opportunities. If you are interested in what I have to offer, please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have.

education.description: An intense and comprehensive 52-week Software Engineering course that prepares students to enter the workforce with the knowledge and skills sought after by employers throughout the industry for Front and Back-End Web Development.

An intense and comprehensive 26-week Software Engineering course that prepares students to enter the workforce with the knowledge and skills sought after by employers throughout the industry for Front and Back-End Web Development.
